item.title: Trump agrees to delay 50% tariff on EU goods by more than a month
item.description: President Trump has delayed the 50% tariff he recently vowed to impose on European goods.

item.title: Trump officials say judge blocking murderers' deportations ruining U.S. foreign policy talks
item.description: The Trump administration for months has obliquely warned judges their immigration rulings were messing with touchy foreign policy negotiations.

item.title: Sen. Michael Bennet blames Democratic Party's failures for fueling President Trump's rise
item.description: Sen. Michael Bennet says the Democratic brand is in the toilet nationwide because it has failed to prove it can address voters' challenges.

item.title: Sen. Ron Johnson pans spending in House bill, warns it will add $4 trillion to national debt
item.description: Sen. Ron Johnson says the spending cuts in President Trump's "big beautiful bill" amounts to a "rounding error" in the amount of money Uncle Sam spend...

item.title: Johnson accuses Democrats of 'twisted the facts' on Medicaid changes
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson said Sunday that Democrats are lying about the impact President Trump's "big, beautiful bill" will have on Medicaid, castin...
